description.p: Nautune is a feature-rich music player for Jellyfin media servers. Stream your personal music library with a polished, cross-platform experience featuring adaptive colors, lyrics, waveform visualizers, gapless playback, and collaborative listening via Fleet Mode.

ul.li: Gapless and crossfade playback with ReplayGain support
Adaptive UI colors extracted from album artwork
Fleet Mode: synchronized playback across devices
Helm Mode: remote control other Nautune instances
Offline downloads for listening without a connection
Smart Mix, Instant Mix, and listening analytics
